attributes.action: Seek a popular mandate for electoral and legislative reform before 10th October 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Current House of Commons has lost the moral authority to legislate for the people of the UK. A renewed House is required to tackle the issues of electoral and legislative reform and the parties must rejuventate their candidate lists to present the electorate with a choice of capable individuals chosen for their integrity and ability to fearlessly represent their constituents

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
